title: Yawning
author: JGray
text:
Yawning is something that happens a lot in my house as the weather gets colder. I think we all want to hibernate. We don't have the stamina of our neighbors up in Canada, it seems.

Apparently, the same is true of viquirrels. Chrys knows never to underestimate the sleepiness of a viquirrel. It seems she hasn't counted on how handsy Mister Mist is, though.

And I've got another Pathfinder-compatible product out. This one's a simple $1, tiny bit of a thing. Just an upgrade of the Equipment Trick: Rope feat. Just thought I'd let y'all know.

See you Thursday!

replies.author: Adamas*Guest*
replies.text: Ugh Mist creeps me out more and more. I HATE people who are that touchy, at least outside the bedroom. It's called PERSONAL SPACE YA PINHEAD!!!! Six Feet! Get back there!!!

replies.author: TheDerangedOne*Guest*
replies.text: Someone's not being truthful if they keep using the lines of "oh that will never work" and it's variants. Such broken record comments tend to be hiding some rather dirty laundry and a few bones in the closet... possibly entire skeletons.
